verses.text: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

\w In|strong="H3478"\w* Salem \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* tabernacle, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* dwelling place \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Zion.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* he \w brake|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* arrows \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* bow; \w the|strong="H1961"\w* shield, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* battle. \qs Selah\qs*
Glorious art thou \add and \add*excellent, \w from|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H2719"\w* prey.
The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept \w their|strong="H2964"\w* sleep; and none \w of|strong="H2042"\w* the men \w of|strong="H2042"\w* might have found \w their|strong="H2964"\w* hands.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* rebuke, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* chariot \w and|strong="H3027"\w* horse \w are|strong="H3027"\w* cast \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dead \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

Thou, even thou, art \w to|strong="H3290"\w* \w be|strong="H5483"\w* feared: \w and|strong="H7393"\w* who may stand \w in|strong="H7393"\w* \w thy|strong="H3290"\w* sight \w when|strong="H3290"\w* once thou art angry?

\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* didst cause sentence \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* heard \w from|strong="H6440"\w* heaven; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*,

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* arose \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w*, \w to|strong="H8085"\w* save all \w the|strong="H8085"\w* meek \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H6035"\w* praise thee: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* residue \w of|strong="H3605"\w* wrath shalt thou gird \w upon|strong="H6965"\w* thee.

Vow, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* pay \w unto|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God: let all \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* round about \w him|strong="H3588"\w* bring presents \w unto|strong="H3034"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* ought \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* feared.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* princes: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* terrible \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.
